attributes.action: Ensure that British law is enforced regardless of religion or ethnic background.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is imperative that British law applies to all people in Britain regardless of their religious or ethnic background. We could all claim to be members of a religious faith to escape the juristiction of the law of this country but this would cause the total failure of our legal system. Everyone in this country must be governed by the laws of our country.

rejection.details: We do not accept petitions on entirely hypothetical situations.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
